author: Zach Vallese
title: Apple takes on YouTube and Spotify with new video podcasting push
description: Apple on Monday announced that it will bring a new integrated video podcast experience to Apple Podcasts this spring.
content:
Apple on Monday announced that it will bring a new integrated video podcast experience to Apple Podcasts this spring.
The move comes as video viewership continues to reshape podcasting. About 37% of… [+2875 chars]
